TopicTitle: Buying Into Parts After Researched Tree

Articles.Content:
With the new UI on Xbox Enhanced, I started a new career.  Flew some contracts to get funds and science.  Used the science to unlock Basic Rocketry tree.  My career settings are to require Buying Into parts.  Went to buy Swivel Engine with Tree researched (says it is researched).  I click Right Stick to go to Parts in Basic Rocketry.  I highlight Swivel Engine with 72K funds (engine cost 3.5K)....I get no UI on how to buy the Swivel Engine or any other part in any tree I've researched.

What am I doing wrong?

Again, new Xbox UI.

Thanks.
